item.description:
Register now for Trothmoot 2012!

June 7-10 will be the organization's 25th annual gathering. Many Troth Elders will be in attendance. This Trothmoot will present participants with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to meet some of the greatest movers and shakers in Heathenry and to hear their experiences first hand.

Among the notable attendees:

·        Freya Aswynn, author of “Northern Mysteries and Magick” and more

·        William Bainbridge,  former Troth president; former editor of “Idunna,” the Troth's quarterly newsletter

·        James Chisholm, Troth co-founder; translator of “The Eddas”

·        Kveldulf Gundarsson, author of “Our Troth: Vols. I & II” and more

·        Diana L. Paxson, current and long-time editor of “Idunna”, author of “Taking Up The Runes” and more

Join us for workshops, vendors, and more! Among the planned events are an Elder Panel discussion, many children's activities, Blots (Tyr, Idunna, Holle, and others), Viking Games, Mead Contest, Oracular Seidh, Skald Contest, and a Grand Feast and Sumbel.

Troth membership is not required; all honorable folk are welcome to gather in Frith, Grith, and Good Will. Please visit The Troth's website and/or Facebook page for additional info, including prices and registration/waiver forms:

http://tinyurl.com/TROTHMOOT2012

https://www.facebook.com/events/248656218555909/

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: Trothmoot 2012
